TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClient extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker

summary.span: 提供基本类，用于发送 HTTP 请求和接收来自通过 URI 确认的资源的 HTTP 响应。

span.span: Provides a base class for sending HTTP requests and receiving HTTP responses from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实例充当要发送的 HTTP 请求的会话。The class instance acts as a session to send HTTP requests. 实例是适用于该实例执行的所有请求的设置集合。An instance is a collection of settings applied to all requests executed by that instance. 此外，每个实例使用其自己的连接池，隔离执行的其他请求来自其请求实例。In addition, every instance uses its own connection pool, isolating its requests from requests executed by other instances. 还可充当基类更具体的 HTTP 客户端。The also acts as a base class for more specific HTTP clients. 示例将提供特定于 Facebook web 服务的其他方法 FacebookHttpClient (GetFriends 方法，例如)。An example would be a FacebookHttpClient providing additional methods specific to a Facebook web service (a GetFriends method, for instance). 派生的类不应重写类上的虚拟方法。Derived classes should not override the virtual methods on the class. 请改用接受的构造函数重载配置任何售前或后请求处理相反。Instead, use a constructor overload that accepts to configure any pre- or post-request processing instead. 默认情况下，将用于向服务器发送请求。By default, will be used to send requests to the server. 此行为可以修改通过在构造函数重载采用之一中指定不同的通道实例作为参数。This behavior can be modified by specifying a different channel in one of the constructor overloads taking a instance as parameter. 如果身份验证或缓存等功能是必需的可以用于配置设置和实例可以传递给构造函数。If features like authentication or caching are required, can be used to configure settings and the instance can be passed to the constructor. 返回的处理程序可传递到一个构造函数重载采用参数。The returned handler can be passed to one of the constructor overloads taking a parameter. 如果应用使用和中的相关类命名空间打算下载大量数据 （50 兆字节或更多），则应用程序应流式传输的下载文件并不使用的默认缓冲。If an app using and related classes in the namespace intends to download large amounts of data (50 megabytes or more), then the app should stream those downloads and not use the default buffering. 如果使用的默认缓冲，则客户端内存使用情况将变得很大，可能会显著导致性能下降。If the default buffering is used the client memory usage will get very large, potentially resulting in substantially reduced performance. 下面的方法是线程安全：The following methods are thread safe: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 被用于一次实例化和重新使用应用程序的整个生存期。 is intended to be instantiated once and re-used throughout the life of an application. 实例化 HttpClient 类，为每个请求，则将耗尽重度负载下可用的插槽数。Instantiating an HttpClient class for every request will exhaust the number of sockets available under heavy loads. 这将导致 SocketException 错误。This will result in SocketException errors. 下面是使用 HttpClient 正确示例。Below is an example using HttpClient correctly. ```csharp public class GoodController : ApiController { // OK private static readonly HttpClient HttpClient; static GoodController() { HttpClient = new HttpClient(); } } ``` 是一种高级的 API，包装在何处运行每个平台上可用的较低级别功能。The is a high-level API that wraps the lower-level functionality available on each platform where it runs. 每个平台上尝试使用最佳的可用传输：On each platform, tries to use the best available transport: | **Host/Runtime****Host/Runtime** | **后端****Backend** | | --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Windows/.NET FrameworkWindows/.NET Framework | | | Windows/MonoWindows/Mono | | | Windows/UWPWindows/UWP | Windows 本机(HTTP 2.0 支持)Windows native (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Windows/.NET CoreWindows/.NET Core | Windows 本机(HTTP 2.0 支持)Windows native (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Android/XamarinAndroid/Xamarin | 选择在生成时。Selected at build-time. 可以使用也配置为使用 Android 的本机 [`HttpURLConnection`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/Java.Net.HttpURLConnection/)Can either use or be configured to use Android's native [`HttpURLConnection`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/Java.Net.HttpURLConnection/) | | iOS、 tvOS、 watchOS/XamariniOS, tvOS, watchOS/Xamarin | 选择在生成时。Selected at build-time. 可以使用或配置为使用 Apple 的[ `NSUrlSession` ](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 支持)Can either use or be configured to use Apple's [`NSUrlSession`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | macOS/XamarinmacOS/Xamarin | 选择在生成时。Selected at build-time. 可以使用或配置为使用 Apple 的[ `NSUrlSession` ](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 支持)Can either use or be configured to use Apple's [`NSUrlSession`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | macOS/MonomacOS/Mono | | | macOS/.NET CoremacOS/.NET Core | `libcurl`-基于 HTTP 传输协议 (HTTP 2.0 支持)`libcurl`-based HTTP transport (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Linux/MonoLinux/Mono | | | Linux/.NET CoreLinux/.NET Core | `libcurl`-基于 HTTP 传输协议 (HTTP 2.0 支持)`libcurl`-based HTTP transport (HTTP 2.0 capable) | 用户还可以配置的特定传输通过调用构造函数采用。Users can also configure a specific transport for by invoking the constructor that takes an . ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. 当调用此方法时，调用方法以中止所有挂起的请求。When this method is called, the method is called to abort all pending requests.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan Timeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan Timeout
Public Property Timeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求超时前等待的时间跨度。

span.span: Gets or sets the timespan to wait before the request times out.

value.span: 请求超时前等待的时间跨度。

span.span: The timespan to wait before the request times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 100,000 毫秒（100 秒）。The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds). 若要设置无限超时，请将属性值设置为。To set an infinite timeout, set the property value to . 域名系统 (DNS) 查询可能需要最多为 15 秒为单位返回或超时。如果你的请求包含需要解析的主机名，并设置为值小于 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒或更之前引发来指示你的请求超时。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a timeout on your request. 相同的超时将适用于所有请求使用此实例。The same timeout will apply for all requests using this instance. 您还可以设置不同的使用的各个请求的超时任务。You may also set different timeouts for individual requests using a on a task. 请注意，只有较短的两个超时将应用。Note that only the shorter of the two timeouts will apply.

exception.span: 指定的超时值小于或等于零，而不是 。

span.span: The timeout specified is less than or equal to zero and is not .

span.span: An operation has already been started on the current instance.

exception.span: 已释放当前实例。

span.span: The current instance has been disposed.
